Author: Pip
Comment: The CGI scenes are absolutely **amazing**, but the film as a whole, is, er, lacking (even if you’ve read the book!).

Author: Anonymous
Comment:
I saw it last night and have to agree with the review..

My favourite ‘time slip’ moment was when Harry found Barty Crouch senior collapsed in the woods and went to tell Dumblydore.. then just didn’t… next thing you know it’s the 3rd task, to which no-one made any reference..

still.. I cried like a girl at the end..
